msContents.summary: Author asks White for help in finding a orphaned girl to house and to educate.

objectDesc.p: A typed letter from Dr. J. Seth Hills to Eartha M. M. White on 12/9/1929. The single page letter has Hills' business heading on it.

Miss Eartha M. White
Jacksonville, Fla.
My dear Miss Eartha:

div.p:
I am in search of a girl about sixteen or
seventeen years of age who is dependent and
wants a good home and an education. We have
such a place in our home for the right kind
of girl. We will school her, provide her with
clothing, a home and spending money.

I would rather have an orphan or some one
who really has no one to care for them. She
must be neat and industrious and willing to go
to school. I do know not who has charge of the or
phanage now or if there is such a girl in the
orphans home. I am writing to you because you
know almost every body and also know of many de
pendent persons. Please give the matter some
consideration and be prepared, if possible, to talk
with me when I come to Jax.Jacksonville next Thursday the
18th Inst.instead.
I trust you are well and prosperous.
